locale.s: Your selection must be converted to a movie clip in order to apply a code snippet. Animate will convert and create an instance name for you before applying the code snippet.
This action requires an object to be selected on Stage.
The selected symbol requires an instance name. Animate will create an instance name before applying the code sample.
Please select a code snippet first.
Are you sure you want to reset to the default code snippets xml file? You will lose any custom code snippets.
Please open a FLA file first.
To add code for this object, please select an instance of the object in either the main timeline or in a Movie Clip timeline.
Select a code snippets xml file
Could not load XML. Please verify XML is correctly formatted and does not contain special characters.
Are you sure you want to delete '{snippetName}'?
